content: Btc was not created by satshi satoshhi In fact was just blck market owners same as libert resrrve been doing just now together with goverment money dont know ethics and morals.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 16, 2022, 07:12:32 AMIts good to understood what is the crypto and who is who.How about you do some reading around the forum with the loads of information about bitcoin available here, than sharing what you have been told from people who clearly do not know much?I assure you that you will learn more from the users here.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Who the heck is satshi satoshhi in the first place?

comments.author: 325btc
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 16, 2022, 07:39:11 AMWho the heck is satshi satoshhi in the first place?Cmonn maan? Satosjhi nacamoto off c !!Why u in btc if u even dont know so called btc creator name

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Yes, Bitcoin was not created by satoshi satoshhi. It was created by a person who used a pseudonym called Satoshi Nakamoto.What is a Pseudonym?A pseudonym or alias is a fictitious name that a person or group assumes for a particular purpose, which differs from their original or true name.I hope this makes some sense for you, have a good weekend.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 16, 2022, 07:12:32 AM...satshi satoshhi...You must be kidding the people here with things that you can't verify for yourself and only know how to spread. First look at where you are going wrong, and instead of arguing with just a few small steps to learn about WP bitcoin, there is no need to argue if someone is wrong but they are exaggerating the problem.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Dude, your characters feels like you're just sending SMS to us.Quote from: 325btc on July 16, 2022, 07:12:32 AMBtc was not created by satshi satoshhi In fact was just blck market owners same as libert resrrve been doing just now together with goverment money dont know ethics and morals.Okay then so that means that satoshi=blackmarket syndicate? Honestly, many don't care anymore who satoshi is especially the new investors. But to us, we do care a lot and thankful to him and whoever he/she or they was, and we're all aware that it's an alias/pseudonym and we'll never know who he really is and there goes too many speculations on who he was.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Well he's right, you know. satshi satoshhi definitely did NOT create Bitcoin. I can confirm this 100%.Liberty Reserve? Well that's a blast from the past that for me stays in the same black hole as e-gold. Wonder who OP would like to think uses ethics and morals in an alternative system.
